title: Going from 99lp to promos
body: Does anyone else feel a little ripped off going from like 95+ lp then getting a win and going to promos, I mean making it into promos is cool and all but essentially you're only getting 5 or so lp for that win as oppose to an actual win in your promos and it doesn't feel as rewarding. I can't really think of a way to change it but it is a minor annoyance of mine.

replies.body:
what an injustice

lp should be rounded up smh tbh
Well considering it influences your LP if you lose the promos, and doesn't change anything if you win the promos, and considering that LP means nothing compared to MMR, i mean does it really matter?
